count.count_descr: 18:922(g)(1),924(a)(2) and 3551 et seq. - UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. (1)
count.disposition_text: The defendant was sentenced to sixty (60) months total in custody to run concurrently with any sentence that the state court will impose, and granted the defendant credit for the twenty-nine (29) months he has spent in custody, for a total of thirty-one (31) months in custody starting from the date of sentencing. Special Assessment of $100.00.

event.docket_text: JUDGMENT  as to Jordan Mason (1), Count(s) 1, The defendant was sentenced to sixty (60) months total in custody to run concurrently with any sentence that the state court will impose, and granted the defendant credit for the twenty-nine (29) months he has spent in custody, for a total of thirty-one (31) months in custody starting from the date of sentencing.  Special Assessment of $100.00. Ordered by Chief Judge Judy K. Wapner on 9/6/2022.

sentence.remarks: CHC III per SOR = 6 CHP. 60 months custody to run concurrently with any sentence the state court will impose. The court also granted 29 months credit for time spent in state custody resulting in a sentence of 31 months custody starting 9/6/2022.
